entry.title: The WIMP website co-construction management platform from HAMASTAR Technology has a SQL Injection
entry.content:
é“¾æ¥ï¼š https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gpg7-49w7-q7wr

CVSS è¯„åˆ†ï¼š 9.8

å‚è€ƒé“¾æ¥ï¼š

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-6169

  • https://www.twcert.org.tw/en/cp-139-10184-f29ca-2.html

  • https://www.twcert.org.tw/tw/cp-132-10183-99ce1-1.html

æè¿°ï¼š

The WIMP website co-construction management platform from HAMASTAR Technology has a SQL Injection vulnerability, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject arbitrary SQL commands to read, modify, and delete database contents.

entry.title: A vulnerability was found in UTT è¿›å– 750W up to 50 It has been classified as critical This
entry.content:
é“¾æ¥ï¼š https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-h6wp-g6vw-fx8q

CVSS è¯„åˆ†ï¼š 9.8

å‚è€ƒé“¾æ¥ï¼š

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-6098

  • https://github.com/newym/cve/blob/main/utt1.md

  • https://github.com/newym/cve/blob/main/utt1.md#poc

  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.312567

  • https://vuldb.com/?id.312567

  • https://vuldb.com/?submit.589437

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-h6wp-g6vw-fx8q

æè¿°ï¼š

A vulnerability was found in UTT è¿›å– 750W up to 5.0. It has been classified as critical. This affects the function strcpy of the file /goform/setSysAdm of the component API. The manipulation of the argument passwd1 leads to buffer overflow. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.

entry.title: FlexPaper Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
æ¼æ´ä¿¡æ¯

æ¼æ´åç§°ï¼š FlexPaper Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

æ¼æ´ç¼–å·ï¼š

  • CVEï¼š CVE-2018-11686

æ¼æ´ç±»å‹ï¼š å‘½ä»¤æ‰§è¡Œ

æ¼æ´ç­‰çº§ï¼š ä¸¥é‡

æ¼æ´æè¿°ï¼š FlexPaper (FlowPaper) 2.3.6 ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸­çš„ setup.php å’Œ change_config.php æ–‡ä»¶å­˜åœ¨ä¸å®‰å…¨å¤„ç†ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´è¿œç¨‹æ”»å‡»è€…å¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œä»»æ„ä»£ç ã€‚åˆ©ç”¨æ­¤æ¼æ´éœ€è¦èƒ½å¤Ÿè®¿é—®è¿™äº›è„šæœ¬ã€‚

äº§å“å‚å•†ï¼š FlexPaper

äº§å“åç§°ï¼š FlexPaper (FlowPaper)

å½±å“ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š 2.3.6

æ¥æºï¼š https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12369

ç±»å‹ï¼š projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

æ¥æºæ¦‚è¿°

Description:

FlexPaper (FlowPaper) 2.3.6 contains a remote code execution caused by insecure handling in setup.php and change_config.php, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires access to these scripts.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://redtimmysec.wordpress.com/2019/03/07/flexpaper-remote-code-execution
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/b67f601a7711
  • https://github.com/mpgn/CVE-2018-11686
  • https///github.com:mpgn/CVE-2018-11686.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and wonâ€™t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
